title: PQR focal persons training successfully completed in Balochistan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 02 (APP):The Higher Education Commission (HEC) Monday conducted comprehensive training sessions for Pakistan Qualification Register (PQR ) focal persons in Quetta.
According to the HEC, the university representatives from across Balochistan Province attended the event to strengthen the qualification data used in verification processes.
The training focused on enhancing the accuracy and transparency of academic qualification data through the PQR, a centralised HEC database that hosts degree programs from recognised institutions and ensures alignment with the National Qualifications Framework.
Participants gained hands-on experience with essential processes, including data compilation procedures and documentation requirements for NOCs.
The training reinforced HECâ€™s commitment to building a transparent and accountable higher education system that meets international standards.
